verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> of much <S%G4183><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Alleluia <S%G239><s%>; Salvation <S%G4991><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> honour <S%G5092><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>, unto the Lord <S%G2962><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>:

For <S%G3754><s%> true <S%G228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> are his <S%G846><s%> judgments <S%G2920><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> he hath judged <S%G2919><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> whore <S%G4204><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> did corrupt <S%G5351><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> her <S%G846><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hath avenged <S%G1556><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> at <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G1208><s%> they said <S%G2046><s%>, Alleluia <S%G239><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> smoke <S%G2586><s%> rose up <S%G305><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> twenty <S%G1501><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> fell down <S%G4098><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshipped <S%G4352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Amen <S%G281><s%>; Alleluia <S%G239><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Praise <S%G134><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, all ye <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye that fear <S%G5399><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, both <S%G2532><s%> small <S%G3398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> waters <S%G5204><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of mighty <S%G2478><s%> thunderings <S%G1027><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Alleluia <S%G239><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> omnipotent <S%G3841><s%> reigneth <S%G936><s%>.

Let us be glad <S%G5463><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rejoice <S%G21><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> honour <S%G1391><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> the marriage <S%G1062><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> hath made <S%G2090><s%> herself <S%G1438><s%> ready <S%G2090><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> to her <S%G846><s%> was granted <S%G1325><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> she should be arrayed <S%G4016><s%> in fine linen <S%G1039><s%>, clean <S%G2513><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> white <S%G2986><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the fine linen <S%G1039><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the righteousness <S%G1345><s%> of saints <S%G40><s%>. white: or, bright

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, Write <S%G1125><s%>, Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are they which are called <S%G2564><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the marriage <S%G1062><s%> supper <S%G1173><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the true <S%G228><s%> sayings <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I fell <S%G4098><s%> at <S%G1715><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> to worship <S%G4352><s%> him <S%G846><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, See <S%G3708><s%> thou do it not <S%G3361><s%>: I am <S%G1510><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> fellowservant <S%G4889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> that have <S%G2192><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%>: worship <S%G4352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of prophecy <S%G4394><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> opened <S%G455><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> horse <S%G2462><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he that sat <S%G2521><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%> was called <S%G2564><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> True <S%G228><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> he doth judge <S%G2919><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> make war <S%G4170><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> His <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> were as <S%G5613><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> were many <S%G4183><s%> crowns <S%G1238><s%>; and he had <S%G2192><s%> a name <S%G3686><s%> written <S%G1125><s%>, that <S%G3739><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%>, but <S%G1508><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he was clothed <S%G4016><s%> with a vesture <S%G2440><s%> dipped <S%G911><s%> in blood <S%G129><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> The Word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the armies <S%G4753><s%> which were <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> horses <S%G2462><s%>, clothed <S%G1746><s%> in fine linen <S%G1039><s%>, white <S%G3022><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> clean <S%G2513><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> goeth <S%G1607><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> sword <S%G4501><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%> he should smite <S%G3960><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> shall rule <S%G4165><s%> them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a rod <S%G4464><s%> of iron <S%G4603><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> treadeth <S%G3961><s%> the winepress <S%G3025><s%> <S%G3631><s%> of the fierceness <S%G2372><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> of Almighty <S%G3841><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he hath <S%G2192><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his vesture <S%G2440><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> thigh <S%G3382><s%> a name <S%G3686><s%> written <S%G1125><s%>, KING <S%G935><s%> OF KINGS <S%G935><s%>, AND <S%G2532><s%> LORD <S%G2962><s%> OF LORDS <S%G2962><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> an <S%G1520><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the fowls <S%G3732><s%> that fly <S%G4072><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst of heaven <S%G3321><s%>, Come <S%G1205><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gather yourselves together <S%G4863><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the supper <S%G1173><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>;

That <S%G2443><s%> ye may eat <S%G5315><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of kings <S%G935><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of captains <S%G5506><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of mighty men <S%G2478><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of horses <S%G2462><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of them that sit <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men, both free <S%G1658><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bond <S%G1401><s%>, both <S%G2532><s%> small <S%G3398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> armies <S%G4753><s%>, gathered together <S%G4863><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> him that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the horse <S%G2462><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> army <S%G4753><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> was taken <S%G4084><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G5127><s%> the false prophet <S%G5578><s%> that wrought <S%G4160><s%> miracles <S%G4592><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, with <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he deceived <S%G4105><s%> them that had received <S%G2983><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> of the beast <S%G2342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> them that worshipped <S%G4352><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image <S%G1504><s%>. These both <S%G1417><s%> were cast <S%G906><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> burning <S%G2545><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> brimstone <S%G2303><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the remnant <S%G3062><s%> were slain <S%G615><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the sword <S%G4501><s%> of him that sat <S%G2521><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the horse <S%G2462><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> sword proceeded <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the fowls <S%G3732><s%> were filled <S%G5526><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>.
